Package food

Class HalfMeal

java.lang.Object
food.Meal
food.HalfMeal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class HalfMeal extends Meal
Represents a half meal in the system. A half meal is a type of Meal composed of exactly two dishes. The meal must contain a MainDish and either a Starter or a Dessert. The formula type is determined based on the combination of dishes included.
Author:
Alisson Bonatto

      public HalfMeal(String name, Set<Dish> dishes) throws BadMealFormulaException, UnrecognizedDishException
      Constructs a HalfMeal with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the meal
      dishes - the dishes included in the meal
      Throws:
      BadMealFormulaException - if the combination of dishes is invalid
      UnrecognizedDishException - if a dish type is unrecognized

    • HalfMeal

      Constructs a HalfMeal with specified parameters and a pricing strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the meal
      dishes - the set of dishes included in the meal
      pricingStrategy - the pricing strategy to apply to the meal
      Throws:
      BadMealFormulaException - if the combination of dishes is invalid
      UnrecognizedDishException - if a dish type is unrecognized
